author: Giles Shaxted
comment: Just recently my battery drain became awful on my Sony SW3. Couldn't work out why. Changed the watch face to a stock Sony face and I am back to 2 days rather than 6 hours. Nothing changed on my end hardware wise. Its been since February. I just thought it was the battery gone bad. Turned out when I changed the watch face battery was fine.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Giles, Thank you for the review. Can you please let us know what exactly changed hardware/OS wise at your end. The last update to the watch face was in February 2016. Please send us the order details at softwareceres@gmail.com so that we can process a refund as well as try to figure out the issue.

title: Been using for a while... Until

author: Dave Waddling
comment: The interface is pretty clunky for options and there is no control over what gets displayed in the details. Steps would be nicer than phone battery. Seems to suck the power from my phone and watch.
title: Really cool look but...

author: Victor Jones
comment: This watch face doesn't work with the new version of Android wear.

author: Darren Luke
comment: I like it but wish there was a way to change the time to ambient mode to something like 20 seconds.

author: Enrique Zapata
comment: Love it, it'll be nice for this app to show weather.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Enrique, thanks for the nice review!

author: Ian Findlay
comment: Like it very much.

Seems to be a watch battery drain.  Could do without the popups on the watch and phone battery, and the sunrise/sunset times.  But it's good, but could be so much more.  Edit:  developers updated app with one of my recommendations, and its alot better.  Thanks!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Jay, thanks for the rating and the review. Please send us an email at softwareceres@gmail.com so that we can look into the issue you are facing.

title: It's good but...

author: Jason Platt
comment: I love this watch face, but ambient mode shows almost nothing. It's too blank. Many other faces allow more detail from ambient mode and that's needed here. UPDATE: Dev added more info to ambient mode, so now it's FIVE STARS!! Definitely happy the devs listened and responded!!! 😊

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Jason, Thank you for the updated review. We intend to earn the 5th star soon!

title: A excellent watch face!

author: Carla Chadwick
comment: This is the first time I have ever reviewed an app but I just had to say how amazing Paper Watch is!  Not only classy looking, but some really cool features as well!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks Clara. Appreciate the kind review!

author: Fuhu Xia
comment: Love the design. The blueprint background look gorgeous on my LG urbane. The ambient mode, whoever, is either too busy or too simple. Wish there is an intermediate level and shows hands and a few dots.
title: I will stick to this one

author: Nathan Drozd
comment: Company working through on issues with moto 360 2nd gen.  Top rate customer service! Love watch look

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Nathan, Sorry that you are facing issues with the watch face. Can you please send us an email at softwareceres@gmail.com with a screenshot and the exact model number of the moto 360 2nd gen watch, so that we can proceed to rectify the issues. Thanks.

author: Ryan Houseman
comment: This is my go to watch face!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you Ryan for the wonderful review.

title: Love this!

author: Anthony McCall
comment: Nice

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks!

author: Gina Yashere
comment: Was looking for a watch face which was practical, but not too manly. I don't wanna be a pilot! This one fits the bill perfectly. Love it! There are women that like smartwatches too! The developer is also very responsive to enquiries also. Win win!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Good one Gina! Glad that you like it.

title: Gorgeous

author: Ted Miller
comment: I was skeptical but the various options all look great. Love the battery indicators. Well designed

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the kind review.

title: New favorite

author: Vaan Sun
comment: That is fantastic! I am a new fan of ur app in China. Cool....Look forward for new updates.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks for the wonderful review!

title: My favorite!

author: Nadeem Qureshi
comment: Nmq

author: Robert Swann
comment: It currently says that it's August. The date settings on the phone are correct

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Robert, Sorry about that, and thanks for pointing it out. The bug was introduced in the version published yesterday (7/15/2015). Fixed in the latest one, now available for update.

title: Good design, but shows wrong date

author: jesse Summers
comment: Just got it on my new Moto 360,awesome!!! So cool and so clearance love the back too, something different keep up the great work, my favorite so far. Like the drag setting too . it's a keeper no refund here. Oh and seven faces too choose from!!!!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the awesome review Jesse.

title: Paper watch

author: Krishan Chandra
comment: For some reason the the phone battery meter isn't functioning for me. I'm probably doing something wrong. But so far can't figure out why it isn't working. I'm using a Moto 360 and a moto nexus 6

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content:
Thank you Krishan for the review. Please try rebooting your phone once to see if it helps. If it doesn't, please send us an email at softwareceres@gmail.com and we'll take it from there.
UPDATE: Re-installing the watch face fixed the issue.

title: Good face but...

author: Craig McAnuff
comment: I love this watch face!  It's minimal, yet stylish!  I initially had issues with the functionality, but Ceres responded quickly and decisively and published a fix.  They're awesome in my books!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you Craig for being so supportive. Couldn't have done it without you!

title: Great watch face and amazing support!

author: Pierce Watters
comment: I liked the look, but what convinced me to give it a try was the superb support from the manufacturer. Excellent. Oh, it works great, unobtrusive but visible, and it tracks both batteries well.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the kind review.

title: Terrific Face, Super Service

author: Brian Jones
comment: I love the watch face but it's not reflecting the correct phone battery status. It always shows the phone as dead when it's not. Moto X Gen 2 stock 5.1

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Brian, please try reinstalling the app from the play store. If it doesn't help, please send us an email at softwareceres@gmail.com and we'll try to sort this out.

title: Need some help

author: Topher Christiansen
comment: I would have given this watch face five stars before the last Android wear update,  but since then the "hands" on the face don't seem to be in the right place.   I still like the app overall, just not quite 5 stars worth.  EDIT:  Yesterday's update fixed my issue.... and added in different background colors, so it's gone from a 4 to a 5.  Gotta love a responsive dev... thank you!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for your review. Glad that the update resolved the issue.

title: 5 stars before 5.1.1

author: Richard Csutoras
comment: I love the look of this face.   Simple and nice looking.  The developer was also very responsive and helpful when I had a small glitch!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the wonderful review. Glad we could be of help.

title: Really Sharp Watch face

author: Don LaVange
comment: Updates time very slowly. But good looking.
title: Laggy

author: chris peters
comment: The watch face dials are offcentered and so is the date. Looks really tacky and is dysfunctional. Upset that this is a paid watchface app.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Sorry to hear about your bad experience with the watch face. The latest app update contains fixes for 5.1.1 compatibility issues and fixes the issue with the ZenWatch.

title: ZenWatch

author: Alieu Ceesay
comment: I will recommend this app for anybody with an android watch

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks for the nice words.

title: Beautiful face app

author: Hemant Shukla

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you Hemant for the review. Let us know about the latest app update.

title: nice simple watch face. I really like it for the round watch.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you Vincent for the wonderful review.

comment: Spam in notifications.
